pricing.question: What is the price of this item?
pricing.answer: This item consist of a lot of this so it cost $00.00.

pricing.question: Why is this item so much money?
pricing.answer: This item is so much money because I said so.

pricing.question: Do you accept international credit cards?
pricing.answer: We accept all credits except for some so be careful.

pricing.question: What can cause my order to be delayed?
pricing.answer: Orders can be delayed from all sorts of reasons.

support.question: Where can I find support for my problem?
support.answer: I'm not sure, have you checked our home page.

support.question: Who should I contact when I need help?
support.answer: You can find our contact page here.

support.question: Where are you located?
support.answer: We are location in this region.

support.question: How do I make sure I order the right thing?
support.answer: You can check right here to make sure.

returns.question: What is the return policy?
returns.answer: We have a type of return policy but we don't.

returns.question: Can I return this online?
returns.answer: Some products can be returned online, but some can't.

returns.question: Where can I return this product?
When will be get my return?
returns.answer: You will receive an email right here.

technical.question: Where can I find in-person technical help?
technical.answer: You can find that on our home page.

technical.question: Why can I find the technical help page?
technical.answer: Please call us here for help.

technical.question: When are your maintenance schedules?
technical.answer: We will notify you so be on the look out.

technical.question: I have trouble watching the video, what should I do?
technical.answer: Please refresh your browser and clear your cookies and try again.

license.question: Why is the site not available in my location?
Where did you get your license?
license.answer: We got it from the place right here.

license.question: What is a product key?
license.answer: The product key is here on our licensing.

license.question: I need more information about installing your services?
license.answer: You can find all that information here.
